name: DoubleDashing
description:
DOUBLEDASHING

Dash twice for double the height!

Entry for the Game Off 2022 Jam, Theme: Cliche

Dive deep under Water to rescue the Princess. Luckily you have unlimited breath and a magic Jetpack. Can you beat the Highscore for the fastest rescue? (by me: 48:36)

The game is a classic Foddian style rage game, with the biggest influence being Jump King. The mechanics are similar, but with some notable differences, being:

- Jumping/Dashing twice + in Air

- Jump direction is changeable with the mouse

- Everything is underwater and upside down

- You go down instead of up

- Find coins and Eastereggs to get you some Drip!

- You can enable cheats, but you will be branded one when you finish by cheating!

Controls

- Move: WASD

- Dash: Space

- Pause: Esc

Credits

Great help by Deleteur and the Amogus Skin by Cinema

with Godot 3.5.1
